ControlDescription: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default in your pod definitions (Manual)

COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate the seccomp profile is set to docker/default in pod definitions (details in logs)
COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: The seccomp profile is set to docker/default in pod definitions.

NON_COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate the seccomp profile is not set to docker/default in pod definitions (details in logs)
NON_COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: Remediation required: Set the seccomp profile to docker/default in pod definitions.

ControlDescription: Apply Security Context to Your Pods and Containers (Manual)

COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate security context is applied to pods and containers (details in logs)
COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: Security context is applied to pods and containers.

NON_COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate security context is not applied to pods and containers (details in logs)
NON_COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: Remediation required: Apply security context to pods and containers.

ControlDescription: The default namespace should not be used (Manual)

COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate the default namespace is not in use (details in logs)
COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: The default namespace is not in use.

NON_COMPLIANT.ComplianceStatusReason: Kube-bench logs indicate the default namespace is in use (details in logs)
NON_COMPLIANT.ValidationStatusNotes: Remediation required: Do not use the default namespace.
